sentences.en: He was their adviser, confidant and confessor.
sentences.cn: 他是他们的顾问、知己和倾诉对象。

sentences.en: It's common to have a "cubicle mate" or special confidant in a work setting.
sentences.cn: 在工作环境中，有一个“格子间伙伴”或特殊的知己是很常见的。

sentences.en: Share your anxieties with a confidant.
sentences.cn: 向你的密友倾诉你的焦虑。
